organizations: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
lead_paragraph: On Day 2 of Roger Clemens’s perjury case, his lead lawyer, Rusty Hardin, described how easy it could have been for Clemens’s trainer to manipulate government evidence.
snippet: On Day 2 of Roger Clemens’s perjury case, his lead lawyer, Rusty Hardin, described how easy it could have been for Clemens’s trainer to manipulate government evidence.
